headline: W. R. Berkley Corporation Increases Share Repurchase Authorization
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., January 08, 2026--W. R. Berkley Corporation (NYSE: WRB) announced today that its Board of Directors has increased the Company's share repurchase authorization to 25 million shares of common stock. The Company’s focus continues to be on delivering value to shareholders through building book value as well as returning excess capital to shareholders through a variety of available methods.
